a new solut of dijkstra s concurr program problem asimpl solut to the mutual exclus problem is present whichallow the system to continu to oper despit the failurof ani individu compon cacm august 1974 lamport l criticsection concurr program multiprocess semaphor 4 32 ca740806 jb januari17 1978 9 48 am 1781 4 2618 1828 42618 1854 4 2618 1877 4 2618 1960 4 26182150 4 2618 2150 4 2618 2150 4 2618 22284 2618 2228 4 2618 2256 4 2618 2256 42618 2317 4 2618 2317 4 2618 2319 4 26182377 4 2618 2342 4 2618 2342 4 2618 23424 2618 2376 4 2618 2376 4 2618 2379 42618 2424 4 2618 2482 4 2618 2618 4 26182618 4 2618 2618 4 2618 2618 4 2618 26324 2618 2704 4 2618 2723 4 2618 2738 42618 2740 4 2618 2741 4 2618 2867 4 26183184 4 2618 3184 4 2618 1198 5 2618 13385 2618 1749 5 2618 2256 5 2618 2618 52618 2618 5 2618 2618 5 2618 2895 5 26182150 6 2618 2618 6 2618
